column4: i just installed ubuntu studio and lost one of my scripts. It was real simple but i can´t seem to remember the command. I used it to replace compiz with metacity before suspending. can anyone help me? the command went something along the lines of ¨sudo -u wolfie DISPLAY=¨0
i´m having problems with the ¨DISPLAY¨ part of it
wolfie is specific to you..a simple metacity --replace should do it though
